item.title: By: Tim Clark
item.dc:creator: Tim Clark
item.description: <p>I'm glad I help calm the nerves in you Matt, you do the same for me. ;o)<br/>Your t-shirts this year were excellent and Mark did an awesome job on them. <br/>I also think that the <doing> tshirt was pure genius.</p><p>Until next time......</p>
item.content:encoded:
I'm glad I help calm the nerves in you Matt, you do the same for me. ;o)
Your t-shirts this year were excellent and Mark did an awesome job on them.
I also think that the <doing> tshirt was pure genius.

Until next time……
